recipes.label: First Words
recipes.startdescription: Before I rap on the door. I part my lips, uncurl my tongue and am ready to speak.

recipes.label: Exploring the City
recipes.startdescription: With directions comes a place to go.

recipes.label: Navigating My Thoughts
recipes.startdescription: I wander through the passages of my mind, trying to unravel my feelings about this city.
recipes.description: The Moon is my constant companion, on my travels, and through my thoughts. May she enlighten me, and guide me well.

recipes.label: A Hole In My Heart
recipes.description: Morland saw what I was missing. The negative space in my heart. She took the opportunity to fill this space with stories.

recipes.label: A Burning Will
recipes.description: Agdistis saw what I had. What's missing may simply be out there, looking for me.

recipes.label: Inspect the Package
recipes.description: Neat brown paper, with dried lavender in between the folds of the paper. A riddle of longitudes, lattitudes, tidecharts and rivers was drawn on the outside, and just 7 letters. "to Miss M."
